attributes.action: Act on his letter to the Money Saving expert backing the publics claims to reclaiming there bank charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Cosumers,

Today all 8 million people in the UK who were waiting on the Countries judical system to stand on the side of the public and let the banks know there charges were exsesive and unfair.

The Justice system voted in favour of the banks and not the public stating in other words that it is fair for the banks to charge us approx £35 every time we go overdrawn.

I feel extremely let down by our justice system and even though we supposedly had a letter from the PM to the moneysaving expert Martin stating he was backing the consumers in reclaiming the charges all appears to be a political stunt not to loose votes.

I call upon the  millions of consumers who are OWED by the banks to make a stand and sign this petition to show there disgust in the outcome.

warm regards,

T.Adali
London
